title: My Account Poofed Please Help
body:
My account on the NA Server Tigercrop (username and summoner name) has been acting strange lately. On the client, I got the message that my account has been logged in to on another computer. This happened twice and I decided to change my password. However I cant since the original Email account has been comprimised and I dont have access to it. On the boards I made a support ticket requesting for it to be changed to another email account . Blitzcrank Bot ( God Bless his Soul) told me to log out and change it to a account recovery ticket. I did that, and I could not find it, because by mistake I put the original email as the one that I cant access anymore
.  Then I could not log into my account on the boards/support/etc. I since made another support ticket (sorry) but with the correct email. However when I click on the link sent to me on my email It says that it dosent exist. 

Support Ticket I sent:http://support.riotgames.com/hc/requests/25408991


pls help me
EDIT: It says REDACTED please help me im scared.

replies.body:
Don't worry, we can help!  Filling out an [account recovery form](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=72416) is great, because it will go directly to our account recovery team to help with regaining access.  You will have to create a new one though, because the email would be sent to that address which you don't have access to.  

Since you don't have to login to use the form, it's important to do another with an email you do have access to.

I hope that helps clear things up, and we'll reply back to your new ticket as soon as we can!

The ticket came up as REDACTED. I made a new ticket,  http://support.riotgames.com/hc/requests/25415299

Please help me with this. I cant log into the client either.

REDACTED is information that is hidden to protect your details in case an unauthorized user has a hold of your account.  I was able to verify that your ticket was successfully received and escalated to our account recovery team.  We'll reply back with the conclusion of our investigation as soon as we can!
